name: flux_image_generator
description: Generate high-quality images using the Flux AI model via fal.ai API
author: Skillbox Team

manifest.name: flux_image_generator
manifest.description: Generate high-quality images using the Flux AI model via fal.ai API
manifest.author: Skillbox Team

functions.name: image_gen
functions.description: Generate images from text descriptions. Use this when the user requests an image based on a scene description, such as a diagram, portrait, comic, meme, or any other visual. Always use this tool for image generation requests.

prompt.description: The text description of the desired image

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio for the generated image

num_images.description: The number of images to generate (1-4)

raw.description: If true, generate less processed, more natural-looking images

api_key.description: The API key for the fal.ai service

model_name.description: The name of the model to use for image generation

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled

safety_tolerance.description: The safety tolerance level for the generated image. 1 being the most strict and 5 being the most permissive

output_format.description: The format of the generated image

timeout.description: Timeout for the HTTP request in seconds

max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries for the HTTP request

api_key.description: The API key for the fal.ai service

model_name.description: The name of the model to use for image generation

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled

safety_tolerance.description: The safety tolerance level for the generated image

output_format.description: The format of the generated image
